column4: i got a question how can i run ubuntu 11.10 as smooth as possible on acer aspire one windows 7 starter
by using the desktop livecd, its impossible to break, except maybe physically stepping on it

you can use grub2's iso boot feature to boot it from the disk drive, thats a big speed up, if you have 2+GB of ram you can also use the 'toram' option to copy the iso to a ramdisk (this runs extremly fast)
your on a livecd, so installing xfce most likely will not work, if you want to try it, get the xubuntu livecd
